title: Cher, 73, shows off her toned physique as she rocks the stage in a blue wig and jewelled corset
text:
She's been known for her jaw-dropping performances since she first hit the music scene in 1963.

And singer Cher was sure to dress to impress with several eccentric outfits while performing at her concert in Vienna, Austria, on Monday.

The Different Kind Of Love Song singer, 73, appeared at the Stadthalle as part of her world tour Here We Go Again, which comes to the UK later in October.

Fabulous: Cher, 73, wowed in a jewelled blue corset costume and matching wig at her concert in Vienna, Austria, on Monday

Cher donned a bright blue wig, giving herself a fringe and gravity-defying hair.

She matched the wig with a semi-sheer corset leotard which glistened under the spotlights and was made from blue sequins.

Cher's warrior-inspired outfit was completed with decorative sleeves and the theme was followed through by her back up dancers who carried shields and wore helmets.

Pop Queen: For one of her impressive costumes Cher donned a sparkly toga to her blue wig

Also in the show Cher shook up her look by adding a sparkly toga over the corset, which gathered over her right shoulder.

The Grammy award winner added pink accents of make-up to her look, which stood out under the bright stage lights.

As she performed her hit tunes, Cher clasped a silver microphone and used her free arm to point at the audience.

Show-stopper: The hit-maker wowed on stage in Vienna and was joined by several back up dancers who wore costumes and carried shields

The Here We Go Again Tour is the seventh solo concert tour by the American star, in support of her 26th studio album Dancing Queen.

The tour is the first world tour since her Living Proof: The Farewell Tour, which took place between 2002–2005.

Here We Go Again kicked off in September 2018, and will conclude on 19 December 2019.

Fabulous: Cher is currently on her seventh solo concert tour, the Here We Go Again Tour, which will come to the UK near the end of October

On October 20 Cher will bring her hit show to the UK, playing at London's O2 for two night and then heading to the West Midlands to rock Birmingham Arena.

Other costumes from the show involved the singer dressed as a viking with a neon-orange wig and a burlesque-inspired ensemble.

The concert wraps up with the songstress in black see-through bodysuit.
description: Cher, 73, dressed to impress with several eccentric outfits while performing at her concert in Vienna, Austria, on Monday. The singer is currently on her Here We Go Again world tour.
